text: Selkirk Transit is a public transit system based in Selkirk, Manitoba. The operators are Selkirk and District handi bus. == Fleet == Grande west Vicinity+1 New Flyer XE40 {Part of the rapid transit commuter line owned by Winnipeg} == Retired == CHEVY/ARBOC? Vicinity B30A == History == In 2011, Selkirk Transit started with a cutaway bus. In 2016, they have a big 30-foot bus. In 2020 they will get an XE40 from New flyer as part of the Rapid transit commuter line owned by Winnipeg == References == *http://mysta.ca/ Category:Manitoba Category:Transport in Canada
title: Selkirk Transit
